thread.title: Lisa Jones
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Lisa Jones

author: Lisa Jones
title: Lisa Jones
text: Excellent service. Huge range of products, and I got free next day delivery without having to request it. I returned 2 of the items I bought and got a refund quickly with no questions asked.
